title: Arrest Reports and Court Records for Paul L. Derischebourg (Eight Judicial District Court Clark County, District Court Administration)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Requesting any and all Arrest Reports and Court Records/Transcripts for Paul L. Derischebourg.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Mikayla Might

communications.subject: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: ALPR audit (Callaway Sheriff)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Concerning Flock Safety, these files;

1. Organization Audit in Flock.
The report should include data logged from the period of January 1, 2025, to the date this request is processed. Per Flock's documentation, the Organization Audit is available within the Insights tab and is defined as searches done within the agency.

2. Network Audit in Flock.
The report should include data logged from the period of January 1, 2025, to the date this request is processed. Per Flock's documentation, the Network Audit is available within the Insights tab and is defined as searches of the organization’s Flock network by any agency in the Flock System.

Typically the output for these audits is available in monthly batches.

3. A list of network share settings that include:
3a. Flock networks shared with me
3b. Networks that I’m sharing

Please provide records in their original electronic, machine readable format. For example, please provide csv or spreadsheet files where applicable.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Scott Kampas

communications.subject: RE: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: ALPR audit (Callaway Sheriff)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

I wanted to follow up on the following The Missouri Sunshine Law request, copied below, and originally submitted on Feb. 1, 2026. Please let me know when I can expect to receive a response.

Thanks for your help, and let me know if further clarification is needed.

communications.subject: RE: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: ALPR audit (Callaway Sheriff)
communications.communication:
February 4, 2026

Scott Kampas,

I received your record request.

I spoke with Captain Curtis Hall as he has access to the data and will be 
the one fulfilling this request.  The anticipated fee for the research 
time to extract the data and determine if it involves an active 
investigation will be approximately four hours ($39.80 per hour) for a 
total fee of $159.20.  If the research time is less, you will be refunded 
the difference. 

Per section 610.100.2, investigative reports are closed records until the 
investigation becomes inactive.

You can send payment (money order or cashier's check) to:

Callaway County Sheriff's Office
P.O. Box 817
Fulton, MO  65251

Upon receipt of payment, Captain Hall will begin to fulfill this request. 
If payment has not been received within 90 days, I will consider this 
request withdrawn.
Best regards,

Bobbie Rice
Records Custodian
